onderzoeksplan.title: Research Plan
onderzoeksplan.intro: What's next? Your career report is ready! Now you can start researching, because you want to know more before making a final choice. Choose two (or more) careers from the analysis of your answers that you want to investigate further.
onderzoeksplan.stap1: Ask AI (or Google) for a detailed job description of the positions from your career report. Also ask AI about similar positions. What work is similar? What appeals to you in the answers you get?
onderzoeksplan.stap2: See if you can find job postings that give you an idea of the content of this position and the organizations that have these positions.
onderzoeksplan.stap3: Search LinkedIn for people who do this work. What is their background?
onderzoeksplan.stap4: Is there a professional association? What do you read on the website about developments in the sector and the profession?
onderzoeksplan.stap5: Does the profession have a trade journal? If so, request one or more and read them. What stands out? Do you get excited about the topics?
onderzoeksplan.stap6: Find organizations where people with this profession work.
onderzoeksplan.stap7: What education might you need for this work? Ask AI or Google.
onderzoeksplan.stap8: Write down all the questions that come to mind during your research. You can ask these to people who already work in this field.
onderzoeksplan.stap9: Make a list of people you would like to talk to about this work and approach them. You can find these people through LinkedIn and/or your personal network.
onderzoeksplan.stap10: Gather enough information to make a choice. Take your time and discuss it with others.
onderzoeksplan.stap11: Once you've learned enough, choose the position that suits you best and fill in the search profile on the website. Vinster will convert your text into a few sentences you can use to let others know what you're looking for. You can now start applying!
onderzoeksplan.afsluiting: We wish you lots of job satisfaction in your next position!
